title: What To Expect For The Stock Market In 2015
teaser: On the first day of trading this year, Bloomberg's Mike Regan weighs in on whether we can expect 2014's strong record to continue.
contentencoded:
On the first day of trading in 2015, we look at what’s expected in the stock market this year — after a strong year in 2014.

Mike Regan of Bloomberg News joins Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd to share his outlook.

Guest

  • Michael Regan, editor at Bloomberg News. He tweets @Â Reganonymous.
